description:
Thanks again to AMD for being a great partner and sponsoring this series! Check out their newly launched Ryzen™ 7 9800X3D CPUs at https://lmg.gg/iQe7P

Enter the giveaway to win one of the three Call Of Duty themed AMD gift boxes featuring the new Ryzen 7 9800X3D, an ASUS ROG Ally X, and an AMD x COD hat: https://lmg.gg/JqW9B

Andrew takes some time on the other side of the camera today. He spends 5000 of AMD's dollars on getting ready for a bike trip.  This should be easy right? How hard can it be to apply stickers? Hopefully we get out of this upgrade alive.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1588894-this-upgrade-is-going-to-kill-him-amd-5000-ultimate-tech-upgrade/

Check Out the Tech from Andrew's Ultimate Upgrade! Thanks AMD!

https://lmg.gg/AMDANDREWM

title: This Upgrade is Going to Kill Him - AMD $5000 Ultimate Tech Upgrade!
